The esgcet package for ESGF Publication
=======================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   install
   esgpublish
   esgmapconv
   esgmkpubrec
   esgpidcitepub
   esgupdate
   esgindexpub

Esgcet is a package of publisher commands for publishing to the `ESGF
<https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/projects/esgf-llnl/>`_ search database.
